aka: I Heard the Flowers Bloomin When I was Eighty
this_title: I Heard the Flowers Blooming When I was Eighty
trans_title: I Heard the Flowers Bloomin When I was Eighty
introduction: 在他80岁生日那天，一位名叫拉里的孤寡老人决定举办他的第一 场钢琴演奏会。由于只能依靠自己，他将他的钢琴移至小镇的中 心，扰乱了小镇里的交通秩序和居民的生活。Synopsis:On his 80th birthday, a lonely old man named Larry decides to hold his first piano concert. With only himself to depend on, he moves his piano to the center of town, interrupting the lives of the town’s commuters.
foreign_title: I Heard the Flowers Blooming When I was Eighty
